comments.comments_text: Goal! Gabriel Jesus hands Ilkay Gundogan (Manchester City) the simplest of tasks from close range after the cross evaded the keeper, and he makes no mistake with his header into the left side of the goal. 1:0.

comments.comments_text: The goal stands! That took a long time for referee Martin Atkinson to decide it wasn’t a foul. The relieved Manchester City players can finally celebrate.

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Cedric Soares (Arsenal) was quite harsh and Martin Atkinson didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
